title: Augusta County: Jedediah Hotchkiss to Sara A. Hotchkiss, April 2, 1863
summary: Hotchkiss relates various bits of news to his wife: his mapmaking, a prayer meeting, the weather, food, prospects for future employment, and some business matters.
keywords: Troop Movement, Military Authority, Church/Religious Activity, Death/Casualties, Camp Life, African Americans, Slavery, Arts/Leisure, Women, Home Front, Family, American Civil War
